outputs.name: cooling_load
outputs.description:
a list of HourlyContinuousCollections for zone cooling load.
There will be one data collection per conditioned zone in the model.

outputs.name: heating_load
outputs.description:
a list of HourlyContinuousCollections for zone heating load.
There will be one data collection per conditioned zone in the model.

inputs.name: _zsz
inputs.description:
Full path to a zone sizing (ZSZ) csv result file that was
generated by EnergyPlus.

name: HB Read Zone Sizing
description:
Parse a zone sizing (ZSZ) csv result file from an energy simulation to get data
collections for the cooling/heating load over the peak design day.
-
